question.questionText: Look at the picture of the circuit to the right. What will happen to the motor if the light bulb burns out?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The motor will continue to run because the motor still has a pathway to the D-cell.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: The motor will burn out also.
The motor will also burn out with the light bulb because it is in parallel circuit.
The motor will stop working because it is in a series.
